message: Guarantee E (Secret Hygiene) is PARTIAL: False pass prevention implemented, placeholder gate (Gate M) implemented, but full secrets scanner (Gate L) is a STUB. Gate L must scan runs/**/logs/, runs/**/reports/, runs/**/artifacts/ for secret patterns (API keys, tokens, passwords, Bearer tokens) and fail if secrets detected.
suggested_fix:
Implement full secrets scanner in tools/validate_secrets_hygiene.py:
1. Define patterns to detect:
   - GitHub tokens: ghp_[A-Za-z0-9]{36}
   - Bearer tokens: Bearer [A-Za-z0-9_-]+
   - API keys: [A-Za-z0-9]{32,}
   - Environment variable leaks: (TOKEN|KEY|SECRET)=[A-Za-z0-9]+
2. Scan runs/**/logs/**, runs/**/reports/**, runs/**/artifacts/**
3. Report all findings with file path and line number
4. Exit code 1 if any secrets found
5. Add tests in tests/unit/test_secrets_scanner.py
6. Reference TC-590 (security and secrets taskcard)
